Quick Start

-- Load a module
local classify = require("tactus.classify")

-- Use it
local classifier = classify.LLMClassifier:new {
    classes = {"Yes", "No"},
    prompt = "Is this a question?"
}

local result = classifier:classify("How are you?")
print(result.value)  -- "Yes"
